}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM: [[Askey]] RT2205D-D56 (Airgo AGN0901AP-01)
This AP (and wireless module) appears to be largely identical to the [[Linksys WRT54GX v1]]. :The device has been tagged with the AGN100 wireless module FCC ID.. :but the only FCC ID printed on the unit is SA3-AGN0901AP0100.
Per the [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices DD-WRT supported devices table], the device is supported.. :provided the Airgo module is replaced with a Broadcom card.
The default SSID is '''Belkin_Pre-N_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' :appears to be a random number.
The included power supply is a OEM AD-121ANDT (12V, 1A). :ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=239319 On the DD-WRT forums]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Airgo must be replaced
First flash use [[dd-wrt:Tftp flash|Tftp flash]]
v24 build 9360 20080330
Please insert instructions here
